name: Gladiator's Arena
description:
Unique Builds Every Run

In this rogue-lite arena survival game, select from a variety of upgrades, select different abilities to become stronger, and create overpowered builds every run.

7 different weapons to choose from


Features

  • Many Weapons to choose from
  • Auto-target weapons by default
  • Fast runs (under 20 minutes)
  • unique upgrades and abilities
